translations: 像邻居的；亲切的；睦邻的

sentences.sentence: It was a neighbourly gesture of theirs.
The noise would have provoked alarm and neighbourly concern.
sentences.translation: 噪音会引响警报并引来邻居注意

sentences.sentence: The older people had stopped being neighbourly to each other.
sentences.translation: 老年人已经停止了友善地对待别人
